help.message: Your request has timed out. Please enter the url again.

Run an instant global performance check of your site! Simply enter the web address below and put it to test. You will see a comparison between the actual performance of your site versus an estimated performance with Akamai's dynamic site and application acceleration capabilities. This version of DV4 provides additional cities and regional views tailored to your target market.
Provides a benchmark for expected performance improvement over one week from a given city to the region in which the Origin is based.
Compares estimated performance over Akamai with actual performance direct to Origin. Breaks down total page download time in to connection time, first byte time and download time.
Compares estimated performance between Akamai and Origin, per city.
Compares estimated average performance between Akamai and Origin, per continent.
Dots on the map indicate the locations of Akamai testing agents. Click on these dots to simulate end user connection times from those locations.
Provides a benchmark for expected performance improvement over one week from a given city to the region in which the Origin is based.
Based on performance-driven site abandonment rates as captured in Forrester 2009 eCommerce
